comment._content: www.newyorker.com/archive/1950/12/02/1950_12_02_035_TNY_C... "Nola Studios, a firm that rents out rehearsal studios. The Nola occupies the 2nd floor of a building running from 51st to 52nd St. and Bway, and it has an extra 20,000 sq. feet in Steinway Hall on 57th St." Piece in on Nola Studios in Audio Record of April 1948: www.archive.org/stream/audiorecord4552newyrich#page/108/m...
